tool_description: Applies various audio effects including distortion, chorus, delay, flanger, phaser, and modulation effects with customizable parameters.

track_id.description: Track ID to process with effects

effect_type.description: Type of effect (distortion, chorus, delay, flanger, phaser, tremolo, vibrato)

rate_hz.description: Modulation rate in Hz for time-based effects (0.1 to 20)

feedback.description: Feedback amount for delay-based effects (0.0 to 0.95)

delay_time_ms.description: Delay time in milliseconds for delay-based effects (1 to 2000)

error_messages: Invalid track ID: The specified track_id does not exist.
Unsupported effect: Use one of [distortion, chorus, delay, flanger, phaser, tremolo, vibrato].
Parameter out of range: intensity, depth, dry_wet_mix must be 0.0-1.0; rate_hz must be 0.1-20; feedback must be 0.0-0.95; delay_time_ms must be 1-2000.
Effect processing failed: Unable to apply the specified effect to the track.
usage: Specify track_id and effect_type, then adjust intensity, rate_hz, depth, feedback, dry_wet_mix, and delay_time_ms as needed for the chosen effect.

effect_applied.description: Name of the effect that was applied

parameters_used.description: List of parameter names and values used
